## Weight Preparation

### Loading of Raw Data

```{r load-raw-data}
raw_preg_2002_2003 <- read_sas(
  data_file = here('data/NSFG/d2002_2003fempreg.sas7bdat'),
  catalog_file = here('data/NSFG/d2002_2003fempreg.sas7bcat')
)
raw_fem_2002_2003 <- read_sas(
  data_file = here('data/NSFG/d2002_2003femresp.sas7bdat'),
  catalog_file = here('data/NSFG/d2002_2003femresp.sas7bcat')
)
```


### Data Preparation

```{r data-preparation, dependson="load-raw-data"}
cm_to_date <- function(x) {
  x_int <- as.integer(x)
  if_else(
    is.na(x_int) | x_int > 9000 | x_int == 0,
    NA,
    ym(paste0(
      floor((x_int - 1) / 12) + 1900,
      factor(
        x_int %% 12,
        levels = 0:11,
        labels = c('Dec', 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov')
      )
    ))
  )
}

data_preg <- select(
    raw_preg_2002_2003,
    CASEID, SECU_P, SEST, FINALWGT,
    
    # Variables used in post-stratification
    AGEPREG,
    DATEND,
    FMAROUT5,
    OUTCOME,
    
    # Variable used in pregnancy counts
    WANTRESP,
    
    # Variable used in births test harness
    HISPRACE,
    NBRNALIV
  ) |>
  mutate(

    # Variables used in post-stratification
    AgeAtEndOfPregnancy = as.integer(AGEPREG / 100),
    Year = year(cm_to_date(DATEND)),
    FMAROUT5 = as_factor(labelled(FMAROUT5, c(
      "MARRIED" = 1,
      "DIVORCED" = 2,
      "WINDOWED" = 3,
      "SEPARATED" = 4,
      "NEVER MARRIED" = 5
    ))),
    OUTCOME = as_factor(labelled(OUTCOME, c(
      "LIVE BIRTH" = 1,
      "INDUCED ABORTION" = 2,
      "STILLBIRTH" = 3,
      "MISCARRIAGE" = 4,
      "ECTOPIC PREGNANCY" = 5,
      "CURRENT PREGNANCY" = 6
    ))),
    
    # Variable used for pregnancy counts
    one = 1,
    intent = as.factor(if_else(
      WANTRESP %in% 1:2,
      'Intended',
      'Unintended'
    )),
    
    # Variables used for births test harness
    HISPRACE= as_factor(labelled(HISPRACE, c(
      "Hispanic" = 1,
      "Non-Hispanic White" = 2,
      "Non-Hispanic Black" = 3,
      "Non-Hispanic Other" = 4
    ))),
    age_group = cut(
      as.integer(AGEPREG / 100),
      breaks = c(0, seq(20, 35, 5), Inf),
      right = FALSE,
      labels = c(
        "Under 20 years",
        "20-24 years",
        "25-29 years",
        "30-34 years",
        "35 years and over"
      )
    ),
    age_group6 = cut(
      as.integer(AGEPREG / 100),
      breaks = c(0, seq(20, 40, 5), Inf),
      right = FALSE,
      labels = c(
        "Under 20 years",
        "20-24 years",
        "25-29 years",
        "30-34 years",
        "35-39 years",
        "40 years and over"
      )
    ),
    marital_status = as.factor(if_else(
      FMAROUT5 == 'MARRIED',
      'Married',
      'Unmarried'
    )),
    
    # Variables used in abortions test harness based on CDC reports
    births = if_else(
      OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH',
      NBRNALIV,
      0
    ),
    abortion = if_else(
      OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION',
      1,
      0
    )
  )


data_fem <- select(
    raw_fem_2002_2003,
    CASEID, SECU_R, SEST, FINALWGT,
    AGER,
    HISP,
    RACE
  ) |>
  mutate(
    one = 1,
    age_group = cut(
      AGER,
      breaks = c(14, 19, 24, 29, 34, 39, 45),
      labels = c('15-19', '20-24', '25-29', '30-34', '35-39', '40-44')
    )
  ) |>
  mutate(
    demographic_category = factor(gsub(
      '[ -]',
      '_',
      paste(
        'Age',
        age_group,
        case_when(
          HISP == 1 ~ 'Hispanic',
          RACE == 1 ~ 'Non-Hispanic Black',
          .default = 'Non-Hispanic Non-Black'
        ),
        sep = '_'
      )
    ))
  ) |>
  left_join(
    data_preg |>
      group_by(CASEID) |>
      summarize(
        abortions_1995_2001 = sum(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1995:2001),
        abortion_1995_2001_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1995:2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1995:2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1995:2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1995:2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1995:2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        abortion_1995plus_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1995_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1995 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1996_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1996 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1996 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1996 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1996 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1996 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 34) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1997_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1997 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1997 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1997 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1997 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1997 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1998_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1998 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1998 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1998 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1998 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1998 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1999_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1999 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1999 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1999 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1999 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1999 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2000_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2000 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2000 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2000 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2000 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2000 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2001_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2001 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35) ~ '35 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        )
      ),
    by = 'CASEID'
  ) |>
  mutate(
    abortions_1995_2001 = coalesce(abortions_1995_2001, 0),
    abortions_1995_2001_multiplier = if_else(
      abortions_1995_2001 >= 1,
      abortions_1995_2001,
      1
    ),
    across(
      ends_with('_age'),
      function(x) {
        factor(
          coalesce(x, 'Other'),
          levels = c(
            'Under 20 years',
            '20-24 years',
            '25-29 years',
            '30-34 years',
            '35 years and over',
            'Other'
          ),
          order = TRUE
        )
      }
    ),
    abortion_1995plus_age = if_else(
      abortion_1995plus_age != abortion_1995_2001_age & abortion_1995_2001_age != 'Other',
      abortion_1995_2001_age,
      abortion_1995plus_age
    )
  )

before_fem <- data_fem |>
  as_survey_design(
    strata = SEST,
    ids = SECU_R,
    weights = FINALWGT,
    nest = TRUE
  ) |>
  as_survey_rep(
    type = 'BRR'
  )
```


### Recreation of Demographic Post-Stratification Targets

```{r create-demographic-post-stratification-targets, dependson="data-preparation"}
demographic_population_totals <- before_fem |>
  group_by(demographic_category) |>
  summarize(
    n = unweighted(sum(one)),
    Est = survey_total(one)
  ) |>
  select(demographic_category, Freq = Est)

population_total <- sum(demographic_population_totals$Freq)

demographic_population_totals |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(decimal = 0)
```


### Creation of External Post-Stratification Targets

```{r create-post-stratification-targets}
guttmacher_APC_national <- read_csv(
    here('data/Guttmacher/NationalAndStatePregnancy_PublicUse.csv'),
    show_col_types = FALSE
  ) |>
  filter(state == 'US') |>
  mutate(interpolated = year %in%
      c(1983, 1986, 1989, 1990, 1993, 1994, 1997, 1998, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2006,
        2009, 2012, 2015)
  ) |>
  select('year', 'interpolated', 'abortionslt20', 'abortions2024',
    'abortions2529', 'abortions3034', 'abortions3539', 'abortions40plus',
    'abortionstotal')

guttmacher_APC_age <- guttmacher_APC_national |>
  filter(year %in% 1995:2001) |>
  rename(
    `Other` = abortionstotal,
    `Under 20 years` = abortionslt20,
    `20-24 years` = abortions2024,
    `25-29 years` = abortions2529,
    `30-34 years` = abortions3034
  ) |>
  mutate(
    `35 years and over` = abortions3539 + abortions40plus,
    .keep = 'unused'
  ) |>
  summarize(across(3:8, sum)) |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = everything(),
    names_to = 'Levels',
    values_to = 'Freq'
  ) |>
  mutate(
    abortion_1995_2001_age = factor(
      Levels,
      levels = c(
        'Under 20 years',
        '20-24 years',
        '25-29 years',
        '30-34 years',
        '35 years and over',
        'Other'
      ),
      ordered = TRUE
    ),
    Freq = if_else(
      abortion_1995_2001_age == 'Other',
      population_total - Freq,
      Freq
    )
  ) |>
  arrange(abortion_1995_2001_age) |>
  select(abortion_1995_2001_age, Freq)


NVSS_age <- read_tsv(
    here('data/NVSS/1995-2001/age.txt'),
    name_repair = 'universal',
    show_col_types = FALSE
  ) |>
  filter(!is.na(Year) | !is.na(Age.of.Mother)) |>
  mutate(
    Variable = paste0('birth_', Year, '_age'),
    Level = factor(
      case_when(
        Age.of.Mother.Code %in% c('15', '15-19') ~ 'Under 20 years',
        Age.of.Mother.Code %in% c('35-39', '40-44', '45-49', '50+') ~ '35 years and over',
        is.na(Age.of.Mother.Code) ~ 'Other',
        .default = Age.of.Mother
      ),
      levels = c(
        'Under 20 years',
        '20-24 years',
        '25-29 years',
        '30-34 years',
        '35 years and over',
        'Other'
      ),
      ordered = TRUE
    ),
    Freq = if_else(
      !is.na(Notes) & Notes == 'Total',
      population_total - Births,
      Births
    )
  ) |>
  group_by(Variable, Level) |>
  summarize(Freq = sum(Freq), .groups = 'drop') |>
  arrange(Variable, Level) |>
  group_by(Variable) |>
  group_split() |>
  lapply(function(tbl) {
    variable_name <- first(pull(tbl, Variable))
    tbl <- select(tbl, -Variable)
    names(tbl) <- c(variable_name, 'Freq')
    tbl
  })
```


### Post-Stratifications

```{r rake-post-stratifications, dependson=c("data-preparation", "create-post-stratification-targets")}
source(here('R/rake2.R'))

post_stratification_targets <- c(
  list(guttmacher_APC_age),
  NVSS_age,
  list(demographic_population_totals)
)

extras <- replicate(length(post_stratification_targets), NULL)
extras[[1]] <- c(
  ~abortions_1995_2001_multiplier,
  ~abortion_1995plus_age
)

post_fem <- rake2(
  before_fem,
  sample.margins = lapply(
    post_stratification_targets,
    \(x) as.formula(paste0('~', colnames(x)[1]))
  ),
  population.margins = post_stratification_targets,
  extras = extras,
  control=list(maxit=25, epsilon=1, verbose=FALSE)
)
```

### Observations with Extreme Weights

#### By Entropy

```{r extreme-entropy, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
entropy_extreme_before <- before_fem$variables |>
  select(CASEID, FINALWGT) |>
  filter(
    FINALWGT^2 > 10 * mean(FINALWGT^2)
  )

entropy_extreme_after <-  after_fem$variables |>
  select(CASEID, FULL_SAMPLE_WGT) |>
  filter(
    FULL_SAMPLE_WGT^2 > 10 * mean(FULL_SAMPLE_WGT^2)
  )

data.frame(
  Label = c(
    'Total Observations',
    'Extreme Weights Before',
    'Extreme Weights After',
    'Difference'
  ),
  Count = c(
    nrow(after_fem),
    nrow(entropy_extreme_before),
    nrow(entropy_extreme_after),
    nrow(entropy_extreme_after) - nrow(entropy_extreme_before)
  )
) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(decimal = 0)
```


#### By Inter-Quartile Range (IQR)

```{r extreme-iqr, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
iqr_extreme_after <- after_fem$variables |>

iqr_extreme_before <- before_fem$variables |>

data.frame(
```

### Post-Stratification Targets

```{r verify-post-stratification, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
after_fem |>
  group_by(abortion_1995_2001_age) |>
  summarize(
    Count = n(),
    Est = survey_total(abortions_1995_2001_multiplier)
  ) |>
  full_join(
    post_stratification_targets[[1]],
    by = join_by(abortion_1995_2001_age)
  ) |>
  mutate(
    Diff = Est - Freq
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(c(Est, Freq), decimal = 0) |>
  fmt_number(c(Est_se, Diff), decimal = 2)

check_poststratifications <- function(targets) {
  variable_name <- colnames(targets)[1]

  estimates <- after_fem |>
    group_by(get(variable_name)) |>
    summarize(
      n = n(),
      Est = survey_total(one)
    )
  
  colnames(estimates)[1] <- variable_name
  
  full_join(
    estimates,
    targets,
    by = variable_name
  ) |>
    mutate(
      Diff = Est - Freq
    ) |>
    gt() |>
    fmt_number(c(Est, Freq), decimal = 0) |>
    fmt_number(c(Est_se, Diff), decimal = 2)
}

check_poststratifications(post_stratification_targets[[2]])
check_poststratifications(post_stratification_targets[[3]])
check_poststratifications(post_stratification_targets[[4]])
check_poststratifications(post_stratification_targets[[5]])
check_poststratifications(post_stratification_targets[[6]])
check_poststratifications(post_stratification_targets[[7]])
check_poststratifications(post_stratification_targets[[9]])

```


### Abortion Adjustments

```{r find-average-abortion-adjustment, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
before_fem |>
  group_by(abortion_1995_2001_age) |>
  summarize(
    Count = n(),
    Before = survey_total(one)
  ) |>
  full_join(
    after_fem |>
      group_by(abortion_1995_2001_age) |>
      summarize(
        After = survey_total(one)
      ),
    by = join_by(abortion_1995_2001_age)
  ) |>
  mutate(
    Factor = After / Before
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(decimal = 0) |>
  fmt_number(Factor, decimal = 2)

before_fem |>
  group_by(abortion_1995plus_age) |>
  summarize(
    Count = n(),
    Before = survey_total(one)
  ) |>
  full_join(
    after_fem |>
      group_by(abortion_1995plus_age) |>
      summarize(
        After = survey_total(one)
      ),
    by = join_by(abortion_1995plus_age)
  ) |>
  mutate(
    Factor = After / Before
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(decimal = 0) |>
  fmt_number(Factor, decimal = 2)
```

### Abortions

This survey will cover years 1995 to 2001.

```{r abortions, dependson=c("create-post-stratification-targets", "create-survey-objects")}
guttmacher_APC_national |>
  filter(year %in% 1995:2001) |>
  summarize(Abortions = sum(abortionstotal)) |>
  cbind(
    before_preg |>
      group_by(Year) |>
      summarize(
        n = unweighted(sum(abortion)),
        Est = survey_total(abortion, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1995:2001) |>
      select(-Year) |>
      summarize(across(everything(), sum)) |>
      rename(
        Est_Before = Est,
        Est_Before_low = Est_low,
        Est_Before_upp = Est_upp
      )
  ) |>
  cbind(
    after_preg |>
      group_by(Year) |>
      summarize(
        Est = survey_total(abortion, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1995:2001) |>
      select(-Year) |>
      summarize(across(everything(), sum)) |>
      rename(
        Est_After = Est,
        Est_After_low = Est_low,
        Est_After_upp = Est_upp
      )
  ) |>
  mutate(
    Bias_Before = Est_Before - Abortions,
    Rel_Bias_Before = Bias_Before / Abortions,
    `Covers_Before?` = Abortions <= Est_Before_upp & Abortions >= Est_Before_low,
    Bias_After = Est_After - Abortions,
    Rel_Bias_After = Bias_After / Abortions,
    `Covers_After?` = Abortions <= Est_After_upp & Abortions >= Est_After_low,
    Bias_Diff = abs(Bias_After) - abs(Bias_Before),
    Est_Diff = Est_After - Est_Before,
    Rel_Bias_Diff = abs(Rel_Bias_After) - abs(Rel_Bias_Before),
    `Fixed?` = if_else(
        !`Covers_Before?`,
        `Covers_After?`,
        NA
    ),
    `Broke?` = `Covers_Before?` & !`Covers_After?`
  ) |>
  select(
    n,
    Abortions,
    Est_Before,
    #Est_Before_low,
    #Est_Before_upp,
    Est_After,
    Est_After_low,
    Est_After_upp,
    #Est_Diff,
    #Bias_Before,
    #Bias_After,
    #Bias_Diff,
    Rel_Bias_Before,
    Rel_Bias_After,
    #Rel_Bias_Diff,
    #`Unc_Covers?`,
    #`Cal_Covers?`,
    `Fixed?`,
    `Broke?`
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_percent(contains('Rel_Bias'), decimal = 1)
```

### Pregnancies by Year

This survey will cover years 1995 to 2001.

```{r pregnancies-per-year, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
bind_rows(list(
  before_preg |>
    group_by(Year) |>
    summarize(
      n = n(),
      Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'se')
    ) |>
    mutate(
      RSE = Freq_se / Freq,
      post_strat = 'before'
    ) |>
    filter(Year %in% 1995:2001),
  after_preg |>
    group_by(Year) |>
    summarize(
      n = n(),
      Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'se')
    ) |>
    mutate(
      RSE = Freq_se / Freq,
      post_strat = 'after'
    ) |>
    filter(Year %in% 1995:2001)
)) |> inner_join(
  bind_rows(list(
    before_preg |>
      group_by(Year) |>
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      mutate(
        Freq_CI_range = Freq_upp - Freq_low,
        Rel_CI = Freq_CI_range / Freq,
        post_strat = 'before'
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1995:2001),
    after_preg |>
      group_by(Year) |>
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      mutate(
        Freq_CI_range = Freq_upp - Freq_low,
        Rel_CI = Freq_CI_range / Freq,
        post_strat = 'after'
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1995:2001)
  )),
  by = join_by(Year, post_strat, Freq, n)
) |>
  select(Year, post_strat, everything()) |>
  mutate(
    post_strat = factor(
      post_strat,
      levels = c('before', 'after'),
      ordered = TRUE
    )
  ) |>
  arrange(Year, post_strat) |>
  group_by(Year) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(
    starts_with('Freq'),
    decimals = 0
  ) |>
  fmt_percent(
    c(RSE, Rel_CI)
  )
```

```{r pregnancies-per-year-by-outcome, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      mutate(
        Freq_CI_range = Freq_upp - Freq_low,
        Rel_CI = Freq_CI_range / Freq,
        post_strat = 'before'
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1995:2001),
    after_preg |>
      group_by(Year, OUTCOME) |>
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      mutate(
        Freq_CI_range = Freq_upp - Freq_low,
        Rel_CI = Freq_CI_range / Freq,
        post_strat = 'after'
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1995:2001)
  )),
  by = join_by(Year, OUTCOME, post_strat, Freq, n)
) |>
  select(Year, OUTCOME, post_strat, everything()) |>
  mutate(
    post_strat = factor(
      post_strat,
      levels = c('before', 'after'),
      ordered = TRUE
    )
  ) |>
  arrange(Year, OUTCOME, post_strat) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(
    starts_with('Freq'),
    decimals = 0
  ) |>
  fmt_percent(
    c(RSE, Rel_CI)
  )
```
